conversation.text: Hey, have you ever played this game Fire Wheel 3?
It's got this combat system where you need to manually select what your characters shout when they attack, and it's fully voice acted. It's like the game is constantly screaming at you.

It is! It's also got this mode where there's real-time travel times so it takes like five or six hours to get from one town to another. I actually got up at six this morning to start sailing to the next continent so I could get there by dinner.
This, sister, is the true joy of unemployment.
